title: CID arrests suspect who set fire to bowser during Rambukkana clash
body_lines: The Criminal Investigations Department (CID) has arrested a 28-year old suspect who set fire to the bowser that was carrying fuel during the protest in Rambukkana on April 19.

Police said a video is being circulated on media spotlight the suspect, wearing a green T-shirt seen crossing the railway tracks, throwing projectiles at the bowser which was parked across the railway track and walking away from the scene nonchalantly during the Rambukkana protest.
He would be produced before the Kegalle Magistrate Court today.

A protester was killed in Rambukkana, when police opend fire at a group of angry protestors who agitated over the scarcity or non availability of fuel and also demanding to bring down the increased fuel price.
Moreover, the final rites of the victim who was shot dead to be held today. (DSB)
